title: 1985: a classic F1 season reviewed
summary: Ah, 1985: heart of the decade of Cold War superpowers and Dayglo socks. The year of Marty McFly and Back to the Future – “You made a time machine –…

qa_pairs.question: Which team won the Constructors' Championship in the 1985 Formula 1 season?
Who was the driver that secured the World Drivers' Championship in 1985?
What significant change in tire technology was introduced in the mid-1980s that impacted the 1985 season?
